text: Sir Donald McCullin, CBE, Hon FRPS (born 9 October 1935), is a British photojournalist. He is known for his war photography. His career, which began in 1959, has been about examining the underside of society. His photos also covered the Vietnam War-era.Don McCullin interview in The Guardian 22 December 2012.
